item.title: Lighting drop off
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
The Great Zamboozo:

I start up a single player game and the lighting is fine for about 2 seconds until it fades off into almost nothing. I tried the fix in the pinned discussion but it did not work. anything else I could try?

This is a known issue, no need to upload a picture or anything else.
Here is the fix and link.

To Fix The Over Darkening Issue
Type the following two commands into console

mat_hdr_level 2
mat_tonemapping_occlusion_use_stencil 1

https://steamcommunity.com/app/362890/discussions/0/365172547943756063/?ctp=4#c359543951705979258

Could you upload a save of it when it happens? To see if it’s your machine or if it’s the map.
The saves should be in:
steamapps\common\Black Mesa\bms\save

Which you easiest get to by right clicking the game on steam, properties, local files, browse local files…
